meanings.definition: The quality or state of being oafish.
meanings.sent1: His oafishnesses were evident in the way he tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent2: Her oafishnesses made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: Despite his oafishnesses, he always managed to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The oafishnesses of the giant made him seem even more intimidating.
meanings.sent5: The oafishnesses of the puppy endeared it to everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of an oaf.
meanings.sent1: The oafishnesses of the man were evident in his loud and clumsy movements.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but laugh at the oafishnesses of her friend.
meanings.sent3: His oafishnesses always led to hilarious situations.
meanings.sent4: The oafishnesses of the bear made it seem more cuddly than fierce.
meanings.sent5: The oafishnesses of the clown entertained the children for hours.

meanings.definition: Clumsiness or awkwardness in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her oafishnesses were on full display as she knocked over the vase.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's oafishnesses added to his charm on stage.
meanings.sent3: Despite his oafishnesses, he managed to dance gracefully.
meanings.sent4: The oafishnesses of the robot made it endearing to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The oafishnesses of the toddler made everyone smile.
